## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.accordionRootId property

The `accordionRootId` is a read-only property that holds the unique ID for the root element of the accordion. It leverages the `uniqueId` getter to retrieve a dynamically generated ID from the `idGenerator` or falls back to a default ID if the generator is not available.

This ID is useful for setting attributes or accessing the accordion component via its unique identifier.


 {<!-- -->string<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly accordionRootId: string;
```
